Sword and Paperwork

Gameplay Programmer, Technical Game Designer

April 2024 - August 2024

Project Team: OmniMegaSuperCorp

Genre: Turn-Based Tactics Game

Engine: Unity

Version Control: Github

Coding Language: C#

Special Skills: Yarnspinner

Sword and Paperwork is a Turn-Based Tactics Game where you journey with a crew of misfits to stop an army of other-worldly parasitic warriors from taking over your dimension!

As a Gameplay Programmer I was responsible for:

  • Working on a level editor tool for designers to change the playable areas and trigger regions of a map
  • Creating battle levels based on design specifications with custom level logic and scripted intro/outro segments

As a Technical Game Designer I was responsible for:

  • Designing and playtesting a minigame focused on spawning waves of rats to steal a cheeseball from your opponent's rats
  • Reworking the balance of a pirate ship battle level to account for the addition of a new party member
